body:
Comment 2 by **cdunn2001**: 
Ok. I just tested a fresh build with 'set +o noclobber' at the top of env.bash. That
fixed the problem in src/pkg/deps.bash, but not in test/run, which re-sources my
~/.bashrc.

So I will move 'set -o noclobber' from my ~/.bashrc into ~/.bash_login. That's
reasonable, and along with your change to env.bash, everything works.
